nodes.bodyText:
As id is the primary key in rhnServer and server_id can't be NULL in rhnServerAction, I'd suggest an inner join here.
https://github.com/uyuni-project/uyuni/blob/master/schema/spacewalk/common/tables/rhnServerAction.sql#L22
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -52,6 +54,8 @@ sql:
 				end as event_data
 		from rhnserveraction left outer join rhnactionerrataupdate
 			on rhnserveraction.action_id = rhnactionerrataupdate.action_id
+			left outer join rhnserver 
+				on rhnserveraction.server_id = rhnserver.id

nodes.bodyText: Thank you @moio. I have changed the join to inner join.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -52,6 +54,8 @@ sql:
 				end as event_data
 		from rhnserveraction left outer join rhnactionerrataupdate
 			on rhnserveraction.action_id = rhnactionerrataupdate.action_id
+			left outer join rhnserver 
+				on rhnserveraction.server_id = rhnserver.id

@@ -89,7 +94,7 @@ sql:
 				when summary like 'unsubscribed from channel %' then details
 				when summary like 'Updated system release %' then substr(summary, 24)
 			end
-		from rhnserverhistory
+		from rhnserverhistory left outer join rhnserver on rhnserverhistory.server_id = rhnserver.id

nodes.bodyText: I have changed the join to inner join in the second commit.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -89,7 +94,7 @@ sql:
 				when summary like 'unsubscribed from channel %' then details
 				when summary like 'Updated system release %' then substr(summary, 24)
 			end
-		from rhnserverhistory
+		from rhnserverhistory left outer join rhnserver on rhnserverhistory.server_id = rhnserver.id
